ALERTS.REQUIRED_FIELDS: Please fill in all required fields correctly
ALERTS.REQUIRED_ADDRESS: Please fill in at least one address
ALERTS.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred, please try again later
ALERTS.USER_CREATION: Access data was sent to the user's email. Set user permissions to ensure access
ALERTS.COULD_NOT_ADD_CART_MINIMUM_BATCH: Could not add to cart, minimum batch not reached
ALERTS.INVALID_ORDER_MARKETPLACE: Invalid order, confirm that items are still available in markeplace or have changed
ALERTS.INVALID_ORDER_NO_DEPARTMENT: Invalid order, no department able to approve orders with this registered value
ALERTS.INVALID_ORDER_NO_COST_CENTER: Invalid order, no cost center able to approve orders with this amount registered
ALERTS.INVALID_ORDER_USER_WITHOUT_DEPARTMENT: Invalid order, your permission is not linked to the department
ALERTS.INVALID_ORDER_USER_WITHOUT_COST_CENTER: Invalid order, your permission is not linked to the cost center
ALERTS.INVALID_ORDER_NO_APPROVAL_TYPE: Invalid order, no approval type defined for your companie
ALERTS.INVALID_MINIMUM_BILLING_ALREADY_EXISTS: Minimum billing with this settings already exists
ALERTS.INVALID_ORDER_MINIMUM_BILLING: Invalid order, does not reach the minimum billing
ALERTS.INVALID_ORDER_EXCEEDS_MAX_QUANTITY: Invalid order, any item exceeds the maximum quantity of 1,000,000,000
ALERTS.INVALID_ORDER_REVIEW_ALTREADY_REVIEWED: Order already reviewed by another user
ALERTS.INVALID_ORDER_INVALID_PAYMENT_METHOD: You must select a payment method
ALERTS.PERMISSION_DENIED: You do not have permission to perform this action

AUTH.PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESS: Check your inbox for the next steps. If you don't receive an email, and it's not in your spam folder this could mean you signed up with a different address.
AUTH.PASSWORD_CONFIRMATION_NOT_MATCH: New password and confirmation must be the same
AUTH.RESET_MFA_SUCCESS: Now this user needs to reconfigure two-factor authentication on next login
